smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class RadioService is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '23' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'PreferenceUtil' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'RadioService' with '25' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Stream' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'APIClient' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Socket' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function sort appears to be too complex.
The function update appears to be too complex.
The function handleIntent appears to be too complex.
The function initMediaSession appears to be too complex.
The function search appears to be too complex.
The function search appears to be too complex.
The function parseWebSocketResponse appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function toSong is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.
Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.echeung.moemoekyun.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.echeung.moemoekyun.client.api.callback.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
retrofit2.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
retrofit2.http.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.echeung.moemoekyun.client.api.callback.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.echeung.moemoekyun.client.api.v4.response.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.echeung.moemoekyun.client.api.v4.service.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.echeung.moemoekyun.client.socket.response.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
okhttp3.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
